job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.industry: Telecommunications,Hospital & Health Care,Information Technology and Services
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtsre site reliability engineer ltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggt remote ltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtdesired skills and experienceampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtstrong kubernetes development experience creating deploying and running clustersltpgtltpgtstrong experience working with elastic search prometheus elk kibana or grafana tools for lmaltpgtltpgtstrong experience with python or golang developmentltpgtltpgtexperience monitoring cloud platforms not appsinfrastructure onpremiseltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtdaytodayampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtan employer is looking for a senior site reliability engineer to join their cloud platforms organization this organization delivers a private cloud responsible for hosting business critical workloads such as g and other network functions the cloud platforms development organization is responsible for integrating several open source services and tools to provide this cloud infrastructure at telecom scale team members can expect to work with technologies such as kubernetes airship openstack python golang and many more the development organization is made up of many scrum teams and offers the opportunity to be involved in solving a diverse set of technological challenges including baremetal cloud provisioning supporting cicd for a largescale development organization site reliability engineering or working to ensure the programs loggingmonitoringalerting system is operating efficiently and effectively the development teams in this organization operate at a fast pace and work diligently to stay on the cutting edge of software engineering technologies principles and methodologiesltpgt
